      • withdrawBus

        public static void withdrawBus(int busId)
        Withdraws bus of given id. Bus will be withdrawn to the depot at the moment of the arrival to the terminus.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus id

      • sendFromDepot

        public static void sendFromDepot(int busId)
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot. It clears bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus

      • sendFromDepot

        public void sendFromDepot()
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after arriving from the depot.

      • sendFromTerminus

        public static void sendFromTerminus(int busId)
        Sets bus to start at next iteration after being at the terminus. Increments bus cycles count.
        Parameters:
        busId - id of the bus
